text: I don't think I can control that - we are simply using the RSS feed from the Bugzilla search of open issues. The bug you link doesn't appear in the search any more and if you click the link it is shown as restricted, so I don't think it represents a security issue (to view any Bugzilla result, people need a Bugzilla account and anyone with such an account could set up their own RSS/email feed of open issues so could access the same information).

text: Yeah, I know it might be out of your control. I just was surprised to see some restricted information, because I got in touch with R-core about a package to retrieve information from bugzilla (and to submit issues and comments,) and one of their concerns was leaking restricted bugs/information. Also realized this is not specific to this feed after seeing Bob Rudis own comment about this "bug".
